Block.Name: DBLK_SGD_CARTON_MT
Block.WhereClause:
mt.imk_so_id = so.so_id
 and so.so_id = sod.so_id
 and sod.item_id = ps.item_id
 and mt.shift_id = s.shift_id(+)
 and mt.imk_so_det_id = sod.so_det_id
Block.QueryDataSourceName: sgd_ps_production_mt mt,imk_so_mt so, imk_so_det sod,items_mt ps, sgd_shift_mt s

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :PARAMETER.PARM_MODE IN (PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_EDIT_MODE,
 PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_ADD_MODE
 ) THEN
 
 
 if nvl(:TXT_PS_PROD,0) > nvl(:DSP_MIN_POSSIBLE_PACKS,0) then
 message('Possible Pack cannot be greter than Min. Posssible Pack.');
 message('Possible Pack cannot be greter than Min. Posssible Pack.');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 
 -- pro_pop_detial_part;
-- post;
 end if;

Trigger.Name: ON-POPULATE-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 recstat VARCHAR2(20) := :System.record_status; 
 startitm VARCHAR2(61) := :System.cursor_item; 
 rel_id Relation;
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 IF ( recstat = 'NEW' or recstat = 'INSERT' ) THEN 
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 
 IF :PARAMETER.PARM_MODE IN (PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_EDIT_MODE,
 PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_ADD_MODE
 ) THEN
 pro_pop_detial_part;
 post;
 end if;
 --
 -- Begin DBLK_SGD_CARTON_DET detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:DBLK_SGD_CARTON_MT.TEXT_CARTON_ID_PK is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('DBLK_SGD_CARTON_MT.DBLK_SGD_CARTON_DBLK_SGD_CARTO'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'DBLK_SGD_CARTON_DET'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End DBLK_SGD_CARTON_DET detail program section
 --

 IF ( :System.cursor_item <> startitm ) THEN 
 Go_Item(startitm); 
 Check_Package_Failure; 
 END IF;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: PRE-DELETE
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 --
 -- Begin DBLK_SGD_CARTON_DET detail program section
 --
 DELETE FROM sgd_ps_production_dt det 
 WHERE det.ps_prod_mt_id = :DBLK_SGD_CARTON_MT.TEXT_CARTON_ID_PK;
 --
 -- End DBLK_SGD_CARTON_DET detail program section
 --
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Block.Name: DBLK_SGD_CARTON_DET
Block.WhereClause:
det.so_bs_code_det_id = bsd.so_bs_code_det_id
and bsd.so_det_id = sod.so_det_id
and bsd.ps_code_gen_det_id = psd.ps_code_gen_det_id
and psd.sample_request_det_id = srd.sample_request_det_id
and srd.generated_item_id = itm.item_id 
and srd.sample_request_id = r.sample_request_id
 and itm.item_id = icc.item_id
 and icc.structure_id = ccv.structure_id 
 and icc.code_combination_id = ccv.code_combination_id
Block.QueryDataSourceName: sgd_ps_production_dt det,SGD_SOD_BS_CODE_DETAIL bsd ,imk_so_det sod ,sgd_ps_code_generation_det psd , sgd_sample_request_det srd ,items_mt itm,sgd_sample_request_mt r, items_category icc, code_combination_values ccv

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :TEXT_SALE_ORDER_NO is null then
 :TEXT_SO_CUSTOMER := null;
 :DISP_CUST_PO_NO:= null;
 :TEXT_SO_ID_SEARCH := null;
end if;

SET_WINDOW_PROPERTY(NAME_IN(':PARAMETER.PARM_WIND_NAME'),TITLE,NAME_IN('PARAMETER.PARM_FORM_NAME')||' ['||NAME_IN('PARAMETER.PARM_MODE')||' Mode'||']');

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 cur_form FORMMODULE;
begin
if :TEXT_SALE_ORDER_NO is not null then
 
 cur_form:=FIND_FORM(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM);
 sET_FORM_PROPERTY(cur_form,VALIDATION,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 if :SYSTEM.TRIGGER_BLOCK <> 'DBLK_SGD_CARTON_MT' then
go_block('DBLK_SGD_CARTON_MT');
end if;
-- COPY(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_ADD_MODE,'PARAMETER.PARM_MODE');
 -- PCKG_MENUS.PRO_MENU_CNTRL(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_ADD_MODE); 
 -- PCKG_FORMS.PRO_TEXTBOX_EN(1);
 

for c in (
SELECT so.so_id,sod.so_det_id,ps.item_code,
ps.item_desc,sod.REQ_UOM_QTY FROM imk_so_mt so, imk_so_det sod,items_mt ps
 WHERE
 so.so_id = sod.so_id
 and sod.item_id = ps.item_id
 and so.so_id = :TEXT_SO_ID_SEARCH 
 and sod.so_det_id not in (
select p.imk_so_det_id from sgd_ps_production_mt p where p.so_ps_xref_id = nvl(:parameter.PARM_SO_PS_XREF_ID,-1))
)loop

if :TXT_SO_DET_ID_FK is not null then
next_record;
end if;
 
 :TEXT_SALE_ORDER_ID_FK := c.so_id;
 select s.shift_id ,s.shift_desc
 into :TXT_SHIFT_ID,:TXT_SHIFT_DESC 
 from sgd_shift_mt s
 where s.shift_id = fun_sgd_get_shift_id;

 :TXT_PROD_DATETIME := sysdate;
 :TXT_SO_DET_ID_FK := c.so_det_id;
 :TXT_PS_CODE := c.item_code;
 :TXT_PS_CODE_DT_VW :=c.item_code ;
 :TXT_PS_CODE_DESC :=c.item_desc ;
 :TXT_TOTAL_PACKS := c.REQ_UOM_QTY;
 
set_item_property('BTN_POPULATE',enabled,property_false);
-- post;
-- CREATE_RECORD; 
--message('pair ratio '|| c.REQ_UOM_QTY);
--message('pair ratio '|| c.REQ_UOM_QTY);
end loop;

 --delete_record;
--SET_RECORD_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_RECORD, :SYSTEM.TRIGGER_BLOCK, STATUS, QUERY_STATUS);

--first_record;

--go_block('DBLK_SGD_CARTON_MT');
 SET_FORM_PROPERTY(cur_form,VALIDATION,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 first_Record;
end if;

exception when others then
 message(sqlerrm);
 message(sqlerrm);
 end;

ProgramUnit.Name: FUN_AVAIL_BS_DZN
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
FUNCTION fun_avail_bs_dzn RETURN number IS
lnm_avail_bs number;
BEGIN
 
 select
sum(nvl(mt.PRESSED_QTY_DZN,0) +((nvl(mt.PRESSED_QTY_PCS,0)/24)))
INTO lnm_avail_bs
from 
sgd_boarding_entry_mt mt, sgd_shift_mt s, wiz_segment02 s2, 
code_combination_values ccv, SGD_MACHINE_OPERATOR_DET sic, sgd_batch_making_det bd,
sgd_batch_making_mt bm, sgd_stm_planning_det pd, employee_mt e,
imk_so_mt so, SGD_MACHINE_OPERATOR_DET incrg,sgd_setup_plant_mt pl,
sgd_sample_request_det srd, items_category ic, code_combination_values ccvbs
 
where
mt.shift_id = s.shift_id(+)
and mt.operation_strct_id = s2.structure_id
and mt.operation_seg2_id = s2.segment_id
and mt.cc_comb_id = ccv.code_combination_id
and mt.CC_STRUCT_ID = ccv.structure_id
and mt.shift_incharge_id = sic.mc_opertaor_det_id(+)
and mt.batch_det_id = bd.batch_det_id
and bd.batch_id = bm.batch_id
and mt.entered_by = e.employee_id
and bd.stm_plan_det_id = pd.stm_plan_det_id
and bm.imk_so_id = so.so_id
and mt.shift_incharge_id = incrg.mc_opertaor_det_id(+)
and mt.plant_id = pl.plant_id(+)
and pd.sample_request_det_id = srd.sample_request_det_id
and srd.generated_item_id = ic.item_id
and ic.structure_id = ccvbs.structure_id
and ic.code_combination_id = ccvbs.code_combination_id
and nvl(bm.imk_so_id,0) = nvl(:TXT_SO_ID_DT,-1)
and nvl(srd.generated_item_id,0) = nvl(:TXT_BS_ITEM_ID,-1);

 return lnm_avail_bs;
exception when others then

 return 0;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: FUN_CAL_TOT_SO_QTY
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:

so_qty number(14,2);

ProgramUnit.Name: FUN_CARTON_QTY
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
FUNCTION fun_carton_qty RETURN number IS
qty_dzn number(14,2);
BEGIN
 
/*
 
 select round(sum(round(dt.qty_dzn,10) * round(M.CARTON_TOTAL,10)),10)
 
 INTO qty_dzn
 from sgd_carton_det dt,sgd_carton_mt M 
 where DT.SGD_CARTON_MT_ID = M.SGD_CARTON_MT_ID

 AND dt.so_det_id = nvl(:TEXT_SO_DET_ID,-1);
*/
 
 return 0;
 
exception when others then
 return 0;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: FUN_EN_EDIT_DEL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE fun_en_edit_del IS
lnum_temp number;
BEGIN
/* 
 if fun_Sgd_so_closed_yn(:TEXT_SALE_ORDER_ID_FK) <> 0 then

 lnum_temp := SHOW_ALRT('ALRT_Note','Please Note','Closed Sales Order cannot Edit/Deleted or cannot do carton formations.');
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;*/

ProgramUnit.Name: FUN_TOTAL_PROD_QTY
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
FUNCTION fun_total_prod_qty RETURN number IS
ps_prod_qty number;
BEGIn
 select sum(mt.ps_prod_qty)
 into ps_prod_qty
 from sgd_ps_production_mt mt
 where mt.imk_so_det_id = nvl(:TXT_SO_DET_ID_FK,-1)
 and mt.ps_prod_mt_id <> nvl(:TEXT_CARTON_ID_PK,-1);
 
 return ps_prod_qty;
 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRO_EN_DS_FIND_FIELDS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE pro_en_ds_find_fields IS
BEGIN
 null;
 /*
 if :parameter.parm_mode = pckg_gcnsts.gcst_edit_mode or
 :parameter.parm_mode = pckg_gcnsts.gcst_add_mode then
 
 set_item_property('TEXT_SALE_ORDER_NO',visible,property_false);
 set_item_property('TEXT_SO_CUSTOMER',visible,property_false);
 set_item_property('ITEM128',visible,property_false);
 
 else
 
 set_item_property('TEXT_SALE_ORDER_NO',visible,property_true);
 set_item_property('TEXT_SO_CUSTOMER',visible,property_true);
 set_item_property('TEXT_SALE_ORDER_NO',enabled,property_true);
 
 set_item_property('ITEM128',visible,property_true);
 end if;*/
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRO_POP_DETIAL_PART
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE pro_pop_detial_part IS
BEGIN
 
 if :TXT_SO_DET_ID_FK is not null and :parameter.parm_mode in ( pckg_gcnsts.gcst_add_mode,
 pckg_gcnsts.gcst_edit_mode)
 
 then 
 go_block('DBLK_SGD_CARTON_DET');
 -- clear_block(no_validate);
 for c in (select bsd.so_det_id,itm.item_id,itm.item_code,itm.item_desc,bsd.qty pair_ratio,
 sod.REQ_UOM_QTY,sod.SO_ID,bsd.so_bs_code_det_id
 from SGD_SOD_BS_CODE_DETAIL bsd ,imk_so_det sod ,sgd_ps_code_generation_det psd , sgd_sample_request_det srd ,items_mt itm,sgd_sample_request_mt r, items_category icc, code_combination_values ccv
 where
 bsd.so_det_id = sod.so_det_id
 and bsd.ps_code_gen_det_id = psd.ps_code_gen_det_id
 and psd.sample_request_det_id = srd.sample_request_det_id
 and srd.generated_item_id = itm.item_id 
 and srd.sample_request_id = r.sample_request_id
 and itm.item_id = icc.item_id
 and icc.structure_id = ccv.structure_id 
 and icc.code_combination_id = ccv.code_combination_id
 and bsd.so_det_id = (:TXT_SO_DET_ID_FK))loop
 
 :TEXT_SO_DET_ID := c.so_det_id ;
 :TXT_BS_CODE := c.item_code ;
 :TXT_BS_CODE_DESC := c.item_desc ;
 
 
 :TXT_PAIR_RATIO_PACK := c.pair_ratio ;
 -- :TXT_PAIR_RATIO_PACK := c.REQ_UOM_QTY;
 :TXT_SO_ID_DT := c.SO_ID;
 :TXT_BS_ITEM_ID := c.item_id;
 :TXT_SOD_DET_ID:=c.so_bs_code_det_id;
 --- avail bs dzn
 BEGIN
 
 select
sum(nvl(mt.PRESSED_QTY_DZN,0) +((nvl(mt.PRESSED_QTY_PCS,0)/24)))
INTO :TXT_AVAL_BS_DZN
from 
sgd_boarding_entry_mt mt, sgd_shift_mt s, wiz_segment02 s2, 
code_combination_values ccv, SGD_MACHINE_OPERATOR_DET sic, sgd_batch_making_det bd,
sgd_batch_making_mt bm, sgd_stm_planning_det pd, employee_mt e,
imk_so_mt so, SGD_MACHINE_OPERATOR_DET incrg,sgd_setup_plant_mt pl,
sgd_sample_request_det srd, items_category ic, code_combination_values ccvbs
 
where
mt.shift_id = s.shift_id(+)
and mt.operation_strct_id = s2.structure_id
and mt.operation_seg2_id = s2.segment_id
and mt.cc_comb_id = ccv.code_combination_id
and mt.CC_STRUCT_ID = ccv.structure_id
and mt.shift_incharge_id = sic.mc_opertaor_det_id(+)
and mt.batch_det_id = bd.batch_det_id
and bd.batch_id = bm.batch_id
and mt.entered_by = e.employee_id
and bd.stm_plan_det_id = pd.stm_plan_det_id
and bm.imk_so_id = so.so_id
and mt.shift_incharge_id = incrg.mc_opertaor_det_id(+)
and mt.plant_id = pl.plant_id(+)
and pd.sample_request_det_id = srd.sample_request_det_id
and srd.generated_item_id = ic.item_id
and ic.structure_id = ccvbs.structure_id
and ic.code_combination_id = ccvbs.code_combination_id
and nvl(bm.imk_so_id,0) = nvl(:TXT_SO_ID_DT,-1)
and nvl(srd.generated_item_id,0) = nvl(:TXT_BS_ITEM_ID,-1);

 
exception when others then

 :TXT_AVAL_BS_DZN:=0;
END;
:TEXT_CARTAON_DET_ID_PK := get_single_primary_key('sgd_ps_production_dt','ps_prod_dt_id');
:TEXT_SO_DET_ID:= :TXT_SO_DET_ID_FK;
-- possible packs
 :TXT_POSSIBLE_PACK := (nvl(:TXT_AVAL_BS_DZN,0) *12)/nvl(:TXT_PAIR_RATIO_PACK,1);
 -- total bs dzn
 :TXT_TOTAL_BS_DZN := (nvl(:TXT_TOTAL_PACKS,0) * nvl(:TXT_PAIR_RATIO_PACK,0))/12;
 -- SET_RECORD_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_RECORD, :SYSTEM.TRIGGER_BLOCK, STATUS, QUERY_STATUS);

--- produced dzn
 
:TXT_PRODUCE_DZN := (nvl(:TXT_TOTAL_PROD,0) * nvl(:TXT_PAIR_RATIO_PACK,0))/12;

-- bal dnz
:TXT_BAL_DZN := nvl(:TXT_TOTAL_BS_DZN,0) - nvl(:TXT_PRODUCE_DZN,0);
 next_record;
 end loop;
 delete_record;
 --post;
end if;
exception when others then
 message(sqlerrm);
 message(sqlerrm);
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRO_POPULATE_BTN
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE pro_populate_btn IS
 cur_form FORMMODULE;
begin
if :TEXT_SALE_ORDER_NO is not null then
 
-- cur_form:=FIND_FORM(:SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM);
 --SET_FORM_PROPERTY(cur_form,VALIDATION,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 if :SYSTEM.TRIGGER_BLOCK <> 'DBLK_SGD_CARTON_MT' then
go_block('DBLK_SGD_CARTON_MT');
end if;
-- COPY(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_ADD_MODE,'PARAMETER.PARM_MODE');
 -- PCKG_MENUS.PRO_MENU_CNTRL(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_ADD_MODE); 
 -- PCKG_FORMS.PRO_TEXTBOX_EN(1);
 

for c in (
SELECT so.so_id,sod.so_det_id,ps.item_code,
ps.item_desc,sod.REQ_UOM_QTY FROM imk_so_mt so, imk_so_det sod,items_mt ps
 WHERE
 so.so_id = sod.so_id
 and sod.item_id = ps.item_id
 and so.so_id = :TEXT_SO_ID_SEARCH 
 
)loop

if :TXT_SO_DET_ID_FK is not null then
next_record;
end if;
 
 :TEXT_SALE_ORDER_ID_FK := c.so_id;
 select s.shift_id ,s.shift_desc
 into :TXT_SHIFT_ID,:TXT_SHIFT_DESC 
 from sgd_shift_mt s
 where s.shift_id = fun_sgd_get_shift_id;

 :TXT_PROD_DATETIME := sysdate;
 :TXT_SO_DET_ID_FK := c.so_det_id;
 :TXT_PS_CODE := c.item_code;
 :TXT_PS_CODE_DT_VW :=c.item_code ;
 :TXT_PS_CODE_DESC :=c.item_desc ;
 :TXT_TOTAL_PACKS := c.REQ_UOM_QTY;
 
-- post;
-- CREATE_RECORD; 
--message('pair ratio '|| c.REQ_UOM_QTY);
--message('pair ratio '|| c.REQ_UOM_QTY);
end loop;

 --delete_record;
--SET_RECORD_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_RECORD, :SYSTEM.TRIGGER_BLOCK, STATUS, QUERY_STATUS);

--first_record;

--go_block('DBLK_SGD_CARTON_MT');
-- SET_FORM_PROPERTY(cur_form,VALIDATION,PROPERTY_TRUE);
end if;


exception when others then
 message(sqlerrm);
 message(sqlerrm);
 end;

ProgramUnit.Name: GET_RECORD_STATUS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
function GET_RECORD_STATUS return varchar2 IS
 LVCH_BLK_NAME VARCHAR2(100);
 LVC_RECORD_STATUS VARCHAR2(100) := 'NEW';

BEGIN
 
 

 
 LVCH_BLK_NAME := GET_FORM_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM'), FIRST_NAVIGATION_BLOCK);
 --LVCH_BLK_NAME := (GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(LVCH_BLK_NAME, NEXT_NAVIGATION_BLOCK));
 
 LOOP

 IF GET_RECORD_PROPERTY(get_block_property(LVCH_BLK_NAME,current_record),LVCH_BLK_NAME,STAtus) <> 'NEW' THEN
 LVC_RECORD_STATUS := GET_RECORD_PROPERTY(get_block_property(LVCH_BLK_NAME,current_record),LVCH_BLK_NAME,STAtus); 
 END IF;
 
 LVCH_BLK_NAME := (GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(LVCH_BLK_NAME, NEXT_NAVIGATION_BLOCK));
 
 EXIT WHEN LVCH_BLK_NAME = GET_FORM_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM'), FIRST_NAVIGATION_BLOCK);
 
 
 END LOOP;

 Return LVC_RECORD_STATUS;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRO_DEL_EN
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRO_DEL_EN
 IS 
 BEGIN
 IF ((NAME_IN('PARAMETER.PARM_MODE') = PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_NORMAL_MODE )) 
 THEN
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.DELETE_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.ADD_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.DELETE_MENU',LABEL,'Delete Current Record');
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.ADD_MENU',LABEL,'Add New Record');
 END IF;
 IF ((NAME_IN('PARAMETER.PARM_MODE') = PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_EDIT_MODE )) 
 THEN
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.DELETE_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.ADD_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.DELETE_MENU',LABEL,'Delete Current Row');
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.ADD_MENU',LABEL,'Add New Row');
 END IF ;
 IF ((NAME_IN('PARAMETER.PARM_MODE') = PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_ADD_MODE )) 
 THEN
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.DELETE_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.ADD_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.DELETE_MENU',LABEL,'Delete Current Row');
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.ADD_MENU',LABEL,'Add New Row');
 END IF ; 
 END PRO_DEL_EN;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRO_EXECUTE_QUERY
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRO_EXECUTE_QUERY IS
/*BEGIN
 Go_Block('DBLK_KSL_SCHEMES_ZONES'); 
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 Go_Block('DBLK_KSL_SCHEMES_CUSTS'); 
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 
 Go_Block('DBLK_KSL_SCHEMES_ITEMS'); 
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
END;*/
 LVCH_BLK_NAME VARCHAR2(100);
 LVC_RECORD_STATUS VARCHAR2(100) := 'NEW';
BEGIN
 
 LVCH_BLK_NAME := GET_FORM_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM'), FIRST_NAVIGATION_BLOCK);
 
 LOOP
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 NEXT_BLOCK;
 EXIT WHEN Name_in('system.current_block') = GET_FORM_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM'), FIRST_NAVIGATION_BLOCK);
 END LOOP;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRO_KEY_COMMIT
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRO_KEY_COMMIT
 IS 
 lvch_lst_where VARCHAR2(2000);
 LVCH_ORDER_BY VARCHAR2(2000);
 BEGIN

 COMMIT_FORM;
 IF NAME_IN('SYSTEM.FORM_STATUS') = 'QUERY' THEN
 PRO_TEXTBOX_EN(0);
 GO_ITEM(GET_FORM_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM'),FIRST_BLOCK)||'.'||GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(GET_FORM_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM'),FIRST_BLOCK),FIRST_ITEM));
 MESSAGE(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_SAVE_MSG);
 IF NAME_IN('PARAMETER.PARM_CNCL_TO_FLTER') = 'TRUE' THEN
 ------------------------------------------------
 lvch_lst_where := PCKG_FORMS.FUN_LAST_WHERE_CLAUSE;
 
 
 IF GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK'),ORDER_BY) is not null then
 LVCH_ORDER_BY := GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK'),ORDER_BY);
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK'),ORDER_BY,'');
 END IF;
 
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK'),DEFAULT_WHERE,lvch_lst_where);
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 IF LVCH_ORDER_BY IS NOT NULL THEN
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK'),ORDER_BY,LVCH_ORDER_BY);
 END IF;
 
 
 IF NAME_IN('PARAMETER.PARM_DFLT_WHERE') <> NULL THEN 
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK'),DEFAULT_WHERE,NAME_IN('PARAMETER.PARM_DFLT_WHERE') );
 ELSE
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK'),DEFAULT_WHERE,'');
 END IF ;
 ------------------------------------------------

 COPY(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_FILTERED_MODE,'PARAMETER.PARM_MODE');
 PRO_MENU_CNTRL(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_FILTERED_MODE);
 ELSIF NAME_IN('PARAMETER.PARM_CNCL_TO_FLTER') = 'FALSE' THEN
 COPY(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_NORMAL_MODE,'PARAMETER.PARM_MODE');
 PRO_MENU_CNTRL(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_NORMAL_MODE); 
 END IF;
 END IF ; 
 END PRO_KEY_COMMIT;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRO_KEY_CREREC
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRO_KEY_CREREC
 is
 

 BEGIN

--if NOT( GET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.ADD_MENU',ENABLED) = PROPERTY_FALSE) THEN


 PCKG_SECURITY.CHECK_PERMISSION(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM'),PCKG_SECURITY.GCST_ENTRY,PCKG_SECURITY.GCST_ADD);
 
 
 IF (GET_RECORD_STATUS <> 'NEW' AND NAME_IN('PARAMETER.PARM_MODE') IN( PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_EDIT_MODE,PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_ADD_MODE)) THEN 
 CREATE_RECORD;
 END IF;
 /*IF (GET_RECORD_STATUS <> 'NEW' AND NAME_IN('PARAMETER.PARM_MODE') = PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_NORMAL_MODE) THEN 
 --:PARAMETER.PARM_MODE := PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_ADD_MODE;
 --COPY(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_ADD_MODE,'PARAMETER.PARM_MODE');
 --PCKG_MENUS.PRO_MENU_CNTRL(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_ADD_MODE);
 --PCKG_FORMS.PRO_TEXTBOX_EN(1); 
 --CREATE_RECORD; 
 PRO_TRGR_EDIT;*/
 IF GET_RECORD_STATUS = 'NEW' AND NAME_IN('PARAMETER.PARM_MODE') = PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_NORMAL_MODE THEN
 COPY(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_ADD_MODE,'PARAMETER.PARM_MODE');
 PCKG_MENUS.PRO_MENU_CNTRL(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_ADD_MODE);
 PCKG_FORMS.PRO_TEXTBOX_EN(1);
 
 END IF;
 
--END IF;
 END PRO_KEY_CREREC;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRO_KEY_DELREC
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRO_KEY_DELREC
 IS 
 lnum_delalrt NUMBER;
 BEGIN
 
-- if not ( GET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.ADD_MENU',ENABLED) = PROPERTY_FALSE) THEN
 
 
 
 PCKG_SECURITY.CHECK_PERMISSION(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM'),PCKG_SECURITY.GCST_ENTRY,PCKG_SECURITY.GCST_DELETE);
 IF GET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.DELETE_MENU',ENABLED) = 'TRUE' THEN
 lnum_delalrt := SHOW_ALERT('alrt_delete');
 IF lnum_delalrt = 88 THEN
 DELETE_RECORD;
 END IF; 
 END IF; 
-- end if;
 END PRO_KEY_DELREC;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRO_KEY_ENTQRY
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRO_KEY_ENTQRY
 IS
 BEGIN
 PCKG_SECURITY.CHECK_PERMISSION(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM'),PCKG_SECURITY.GCST_ENTRY,PCKG_SECURITY.GCST_FIND);
 IF NAME_IN('PARAMETER.PARM_MODE')= PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_NORMAL_MODE THEN
 COPY(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_FIND_MODE,'PARAMETER.PARM_MODE');
 PCKG_MENUS.PRO_MENU_CNTRL(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_FIND_MODE);
 ENTER_QUERY(NO_COMMIT); 
 END IF;
 END PRO_KEY_ENTQRY;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRO_KEY_F5
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRO_KEY_F5
 IS
 BEGIN
 
 CLEAR_BLOCK(NO_VALIDATE);
 CLEAR_FORM(NO_VALIDATE);
 PRO_EXECUTE_QUERY;
 COPY(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_normal_MODE,'PARAMETER.PARM_MODE');
 
 pro_textbox_en(0);
 PRO_MENU_CNTRL(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_NORMAL_MODE);

 END PRO_KEY_F5;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRO_MENU_CNTRL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRO_MENU_CNTRL(parm_vch_mode VARCHAR2)
 IS 
 BEGIN
 
 PCKG_GENERAL.POPULATE_PLL_TO_DB_PREF;

 SET_WINDOW_PROPERTY(NAME_IN(':PARAMETER.PARM_WIND_NAME'),TITLE,NAME_IN('PARAMETER.PARM_FORM_NAME')||' ['||NAME_IN('PARAMETER.PARM_MODE')||' Mode'||']');
 IF parm_vch_mode = 'Normal' THEN

 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.EDIT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.CANCEL_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.SAVE_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('SEARCH_MENU.FIND_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('SEARCH_MENU.APPLY_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.FIND_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.APPLY_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 PRO_SCROLL_CNTRL; 
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.PRINT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.PRINT_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.EXIT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 ELSIF parm_vch_mode = 'Add' THEN
 GO_ITEM(GET_FORM_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM'),FIRST_BLOCK)||'.'||GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(GET_FORM_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM'),FIRST_BLOCK),FIRST_ITEM));
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.EDIT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.CANCEL_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.SAVE_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('SEARCH_MENU.FIND_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('SEARCH_MENU.APPLY_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.FIND_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.APPLY_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.FIRSTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.PREVREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.NEXTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.LASTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.PRINT_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.PRINT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.EXIT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 ELSIF parm_vch_mode = 'Edit' THEN
 GO_ITEM(GET_FORM_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM'),FIRST_BLOCK)||'.'||GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(GET_FORM_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM'),FIRST_BLOCK),FIRST_ITEM));
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.EDIT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.CANCEL_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.SAVE_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('SEARCH_MENU.FIND_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('SEARCH_MENU.APPLY_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.FIND_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.APPLY_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.DELETE_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.FIRSTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.PREVREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.NEXTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.LASTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.PRINT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.PRINT_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.EXIT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 ELSIF parm_vch_mode = 'Find' THEN
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.EDIT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.CANCEL_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.SAVE_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('SEARCH_MENU.FIND_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('SEARCH_MENU.APPLY_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.FIND_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.APPLY_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.FIRSTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.PREVREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.NEXTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.LASTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.PRINT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.PRINT_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.EXIT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 ELSIF parm_vch_mode = 'Filtered' AND (NAME_IN('SYSTEM.RECORD_STATUS') = 'QUERY'/*03-JUN-2003 OR NAME_IN('SYSTEM.RECORD_STATUS') = 'CHANGED'*/) THEN
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.EDIT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.CANCEL_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.SAVE_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('SEARCH_MENU.FIND_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('SEARCH_MENU.APPLY_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.FIND_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.APPLY_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 PRO_SCROLL_CNTRL;
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.PRINT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.PRINT_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.EXIT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 ELSIF parm_vch_mode = 'Disabled' THEN
 GO_ITEM(GET_FORM_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM'),FIRST_BLOCK)||'.'||GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(GET_FORM_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM'),FIRST_BLOCK),FIRST_ITEM));
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.EDIT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.CANCEL_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.SAVE_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('SEARCH_MENU.FIND_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('SEARCH_MENU.APPLY_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.FIND_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.APPLY_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.REFRESH_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.FIRSTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.PREVREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.NEXTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.LASTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.PRINT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.PRINT_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.EXIT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE); 
---------------------------------------------
 ELSIF parm_vch_mode = 'Filtered' AND (name_in(':system.record_status') = 'NEW') THEN
 
 GO_ITEM(GET_FORM_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM'),FIRST_BLOCK)||'.'||GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(GET_FORM_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM'),FIRST_BLOCK),FIRST_ITEM));
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.EDIT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.CANCEL_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.SAVE_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('SEARCH_MENU.FIND_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('SEARCH_MENU.APPLY_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.FIND_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.APPLY_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.REFRESH_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.FIRSTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.PREVREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.NEXTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.LASTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.PRINT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.PRINT_HIDE',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('ACTION_MENU.EXIT_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 END IF;
 
 PRO_DEL_EN;
 END PRO_MENU_CNTRL;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRO_POST_BLOCK
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRO_POST_BLOCK IS
BEGIN
 if NAME_IN('PARAMETER.PARM_MODE') IN( PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_FILTERED_MODE ,PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_FIND_MODE) then
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRO_SCROLL_CNTRL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRO_SCROLL_CNTRL IS
 lblk_CUR VARCHAR2(20);
 lvch_relation VARCHAR2(20);
 lvch_next_relation VARCHAR2(50);

 BEGIN 
 PCKG_GENERAL.POPULATE_PLL_TO_DB_PREF;

 IF NAME_IN('system.last_record') = 'TRUE' AND NAME_IN('system.cursor_record') = '1' THEN
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.FIRSTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.NEXTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.PREVREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.LASTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 
 IF GET_RECORD_STATUS ='NEW' AND NAME_IN('system.cursor_record') = '1' AND NAME_IN('PARAMETER.PARM_MODE') = 'Normal' AND GET_FORM_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM'),FIRST_BLOCK) = NAME_IN('system.current_block') THEN 
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('KEY-CREREC');
 END IF;
 
 ELSIF NAME_IN('system.last_record') = 'TRUE' THEN
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.FIRSTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.NEXTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.PREVREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.LASTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 ELSIF NAME_IN('system.cursor_record') = '1' THEN
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.FIRSTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE); 
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.NEXTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.PREVREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.LASTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 ELSE
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.FIRSTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE); 
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.NEXTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.PREVREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_MENU_ITEM_PROPERTY('NAVIGATION_MENU.LASTREC_MENU',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);

 END IF;
 


 END PRO_SCROLL_CNTRL;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRO_TEXTBOX_EN
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
/******************************************************************************************/
/* THIS PROCEDURE SETS THE ENABLE AND DISABLE OF FORM ITEMS. THIS PROCEDURE TAKES ONE */
/* PARAMETER OF NUMBER TYPE . */
/* 0 -> DIABLE ALL ITEMS ON THE FORM */
/* 1 -> ENABLE ALL FIELDS IN CASE OF ADD BUT IN CASE OF EDIT DONOT ENABLE PRIMARY KEY */
/* CREATED ON 05-MAR-2K2. */
/******************************************************************************************/

PROCEDURE PRO_TEXTBOX_EN(PARM_NUM_EN NUMBER) IS
 LVCH_CURR_ITM VARCHAR2(50);
 LVCH_LAST_ITM VARCHAR2(50);
 LNUM_COUNT NUMBER(1) := 0;
 LVCH_TXTBOX_NAME VARCHAR2(50);
 LVCH_BLK_NAME VARCHAR2(50);
 --lvch_dtl_blk_name VARCHAR2(50);

BEGIN
 LVCH_BLK_NAME := GET_FORM_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM'), FIRST_NAVIGATION_BLOCK);
 LOOP
 --------------------------------------- 
 
 LVCH_CURR_ITM := GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(LVCH_BLK_NAME, FIRST_ITEM);
 LVCH_LAST_ITM := GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(LVCH_BLK_NAME, LAST_ITEM);
 LOOP
 IF (GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(LVCH_CURR_ITM, ITEM_TYPE) <> 'BUTTON' AND
 GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(LVCH_CURR_ITM, ITEM_TYPE) <> 'DISPLAY ITEM' AND
 GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(LVCH_CURR_ITM, NAVIGABLE) = 'TRUE') THEN
 IF PARM_NUM_EN = 0 THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(LVCH_CURR_ITM, UPDATEABLE, PROPERTY_OFF);
 IF LNUM_COUNT = 0 THEN
 LVCH_TXTBOX_NAME := LVCH_CURR_ITM;
 LNUM_COUNT := 1;
 END IF;
 ELSIF PARM_NUM_EN = 1 THEN
 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(LVCH_CURR_ITM, PRIMARY_KEY) = 'FALSE' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(LVCH_CURR_ITM, UPDATEABLE, PROPERTY_ON);
 IF LNUM_COUNT = 0 THEN
 LVCH_TXTBOX_NAME := LVCH_CURR_ITM;
 LNUM_COUNT := 1;
 END IF;
 ELSIF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(LVCH_CURR_ITM, PRIMARY_KEY) = 'TRUE' AND
 (NAME_IN('PARAMETER.PARM_MODE') = PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_ADD_MODE) THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(LVCH_CURR_ITM, UPDATEABLE, PROPERTY_ON);
 ELSIF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(LVCH_CURR_ITM, PRIMARY_KEY) = 'TRUE' AND
 (NAME_IN('PARAMETER.PARM_MODE') = PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_EDIT_MODE) THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY(LVCH_CURR_ITM, UPDATEABLE, PROPERTY_OFF);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 
 EXIT WHEN LVCH_CURR_ITM = LVCH_LAST_ITM;
 LVCH_CURR_ITM := GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(LVCH_CURR_ITM, NEXTITEM);
 END LOOP;
 
 IF PARM_NUM_EN = 0 THEN
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(LVCH_BLK_NAME, INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_FALSE);
 ELSIF PARM_NUM_EN = 1 AND (NAME_IN('PARAMETER.PARM_MODE') = PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_ADD_MODE) THEN
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(LVCH_BLK_NAME, INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 
 ELSIF PARM_NUM_EN = 1 AND (NAME_IN('PARAMETER.PARM_MODE') = PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_EDIT_MODE) THEN
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(LVCH_BLK_NAME, INSERT_ALLOWED, PROPERTY_TRUE);
 END IF;
 ----------------------------------------------------------
 LVCH_BLK_NAME := (GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY(LVCH_BLK_NAME, NEXT_NAVIGATION_BLOCK));
 EXIT WHEN LVCH_BLK_NAME = GET_FORM_PROPERTY(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM'), FIRST_NAVIGATION_BLOCK);
 END LOOP;
 --------------------------------------------------------- 
 GO_ITEM(LVCH_TXTBOX_NAME);
END PRO_TEXTBOX_EN;

ProgramUnit.Name: PRO_TRGR_EDIT
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE PRO_TRGR_EDIT
 IS
 
 BEGIN
 

 PCKG_SECURITY.CHECK_PERMISSION(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURRENT_FORM'),PCKG_SECURITY.GCST_ENTRY,PCKG_SECURITY.GCST_EDIT);
 COPY(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_EDIT_MODE,'PARAMETER.PARM_MODE');
 PRO_MENU_CNTRL(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_EDIT_MODE);
 PRO_TEXTBOX_EN(1);
 
 END PRO_TRGR_EDIT;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHECK_PACKAGE_FAILURE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
Procedure Check_Package_Failure IS
BEGIN
 IF NOT ( Form_Success ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: QUERY_MASTER_DETAILS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE Query_Master_Details(rel_id Relation,detail VARCHAR2) IS
 oldmsg VARCHAR2(2); -- Old Message Level Setting
 reldef VARCHAR2(5); -- Relation Deferred Setting
BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Variable(s)
 --
 reldef := Get_Relation_Property(rel_id, DEFERRED_COORDINATION);
 oldmsg := :System.Message_Level;
 --
 -- If NOT Deferred, Goto detail and execute the query.
 --
 IF reldef = 'FALSE' THEN
 Go_Block(detail);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 :System.Message_Level := '10';
 Execute_Query;
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Relation is deferred, mark the detail block as un-coordinated
 --
 Set_Block_Property(detail, COORDINATION_STATUS, NON_COORDINATED);
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 RAISE;
END Query_Master_Details;

ProgramUnit.Name: CLEAR_ALL_MASTER_DETAILS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE Clear_All_Master_Details IS
 mastblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Initial Master Block Causing Coord
 coordop VARCHAR2(30); -- Operation Causing the Coord
 trigblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Cur Block On-Clear-Details Fires On
 startitm VARCHAR2(61); -- Item in which cursor started
 frmstat VARCHAR2(15); -- Form Status
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 curdtl VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Detail Block

 FUNCTION First_Changed_Block_Below(Master VARCHAR2)
 RETURN VARCHAR2 IS
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 retblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Return Block
 BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Vars
 --
 curblk := Master;
 currel := Get_Block_Property(curblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 --
 -- While there exists another relation for this block
 --
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 --
 -- Get the name of the detail block
 --
 curblk := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 --
 -- If this block has changes, return its name
 --
 IF ( Get_Block_Property(curblk, STATUS) = 'CHANGED' ) THEN
 RETURN curblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- No changes, recursively look for changed blocks below
 --
 retblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(curblk);
 --
 -- If some block below is changed, return its name
 --
 IF retblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 RETURN retblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Consider the next relation
 --
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- No changed blocks were found
 --
 RETURN NULL;
 END First_Changed_Block_Below;

BEGIN
 --
 -- Init Local Vars
 --
 mastblk := :System.Master_Block;
 coordop := :System.Coordination_Operation;
 trigblk := :System.Trigger_Block;
 startitm := :System.Cursor_Item;
 frmstat := :System.Form_Status;

 --
 -- If the coordination operation is anything but CLEAR_RECORD or
 -- SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS, then continue checking.
 --
 IF coordop NOT IN ('CLEAR_RECORD', 'SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS') THEN
 --
 -- If we're processing the driving master block...
 --
 IF mastblk = trigblk THEN
 --
 -- If something in the form is changed, find the
 -- first changed block below the master
 --
 IF frmstat = 'CHANGED' THEN
 curblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(mastblk);
 --
 -- If we find a changed block below, go there
 -- and Ask to commit the changes.
 --
 IF curblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 Go_Block(curblk);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(ASK_COMMIT);
 --
 -- If user cancels commit dialog, raise error
 --
 IF NOT ( :System.Form_Status = 'QUERY'
 OR :System.Block_Status = 'NEW' ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;

 --
 -- Clear all the detail blocks for this master without
 -- any further asking to commit.
 --
 currel := Get_Block_Property(trigblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 curdtl := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 IF Get_Block_Property(curdtl, STATUS) <> 'NEW' THEN
 Go_Block(curdtl);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(NO_VALIDATE);
 IF :System.Block_Status <> 'NEW' THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- Put cursor back where it started
 --
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 END IF;
 RAISE;

END Clear_All_Master_Details;

RecordGroup.Name: RGRP_FIND_SO
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select distinct so.so_id,
 so.so_ref_no doc_no,
 sc.company_name,
 so.doc_date,
 so.cust_po_no
 from /*sgd_carton_mt mt,*/ imk_so_mt so,
 customer_mt sc,(select distinct b.imk_so_id from sgd_board_batch_close_dt d, sgd_batch_making_mt b 
where d.batch_id=b.batch_id) closed_batch

 where /* mt.sale_order_id = so.so_id
and*/
 so.customer_id = sc.customer_id
 and so.so_id=closed_batch.imk_so_id/*
and so.so_id not in (select mt.sale_order_id from sgd_carton_mt mt where mt.sale_order_id <> nvl(:TEXT_SALE_ORDER_ID_FK, -1))*/

RecordGroup.Name: RGRP_PACK_CODE
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select d.so_det_id,
 d.pack_no pack_code,
 ii.item_code,
 ii.item_desc,
 d.pairs_per_pack,
 d.req_uom_qty so_qty,
 ccv.code_desc ps_Desc,
 sr.style_desc
 from imk_so_det d,
 items_mt ii,
 items_category ic,
 Code_Combination_Values ccv,
 ssr_style_no_mt sr
 where d.item_id = ii.item_id
 and ii.item_id = ic.item_id
 and ic.structure_id = ccv.structure_id
 and ic.code_combination_id = ccv.code_combination_id
 and d.style_id = sr.style_id(+)
 and d.so_id = :parameter.PARM_SO_ID

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
dECLARE 
 filename VARCHAR2(256); 
 lnm_rec_exist number(14);
BEGIn 

 
 
 

--set_WINDOW_PROPERTY('WIND_KNITTING',WINDOW_STATE,MAXIMIZE);
 PCKG_FORMS.PRO_CENTRALIZE_FORM; 
 
 FILENAME :=PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_LOV_IMG;
 READ_IMAGE_FILE(FILENAME, 'BMP','IMG_LOV');
 
select s.so_id,c.company_name,s.so_ref_no 
INTO :TEXT_SO_ID_SEARCH,:TEXT_SO_CUSTOMER , :TEXT_SALE_ORDER_NO
from 
imk_so_mt s, customer_mt c where s.customer_id = c.customer_id
and s.so_id = :parameter.PARM_SO_ID;
 --
 if :parameter.PARM_KNIT_INSPECT_DET_ID is not null then
 set_block_property('DBLK_MASTER',default_Where, get_block_property('DBLK_MASTER',default_where)||' and mt.SO_PS_XREF_ID =' || :parameter.PARM_SO_PS_XREF_ID );
 end if;

 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 PCKG_FORMS.PRO_TEXTBOX_EN(0);
 PCKG_MENUS.PRO_MENU_CNTRL(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_NORMAL_MODE);

--PRO_TEXTBOX_EN(0);
--PRO_MENU_CNTRL(PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_normal_MODE);




END;

Trigger.Name: ON-ERROR
Trigger.TriggerText:
if error_type='frm' and error_code =10106 then
null;
else
 
PCKG_FORMS.PRO_ON_ERROR;
end if;

Trigger.Name: KEY-COMMIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
--PCKG_MD_MENU_TRGRS.PRO_KEY_COMMIT;
PRO_KEY_COMMIT;

delete from sgd_ps_production_dt d where d.ps_prod_mt_id in (
select mt.ps_prod_mt_id from sgd_ps_production_mt mt where nvl(mt.ps_prod_qty,0) = 0);
delete from sgd_ps_production_mt mt where nvl(mt.ps_prod_qty,0) = 0;
commit;

execute_trigger('WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE');

Trigger.Name: WHEN-MOUSE-DOUBLECLICK
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM IS NOT NULL AND 
 GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM,ITEM_TYPE) NOT IN ('BUTTON','DISPLAY ITEM','LIST') THEN
 
 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM,ENABLED)='TRUE' THEN 
 
 IF (GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM,LOV_NAME) IS NOT NULL OR GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM,DATATYPE)='DATE' ) AND
 :PARAMETER.PARM_MODE IN (PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_EDIT_MODE,PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_ADD_MODE,PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_FIND_MODE) THEN
 DO_KEY('LIST_VALUES');
 
 END IF;
 END IF;
 
 END IF;

Trigger.Name: KEY-LISTVAL
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 ldat_initial_date DATE; 
BEGIN
 
-- MESSAGE(GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM,ITEM_TYPE));

IF :PARAMETER.PARM_MODE IN (PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_EDIT_MODE,
 PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_ADD_MODE
 ) THEN
 
 IF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM,ENABLED) = 'TRUE' AND
 GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM,LOV_NAME) IS NOT NULL AND
 :PARAMETER.PARM_MODE IN (PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_EDIT_MODE,PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_ADD_MODE,PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_FIND_MODE) THEN

 LIST_VALUES;
 
 ELSIF GET_ITEM_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.TRIGGER_ITEM,DATATYPE) ='DATE' AND
 
 :PARAMETER.PARM_MODE IN (PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_EDIT_MODE,PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_ADD_MODE,PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_FIND_MODE) THEN
 
 set_item_instance_property(NAME_IN('SYSTEM.CURSOR_ITEM'),CURRENT_RECORD,VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,'VATT_TEXTBOX_NORMAL');
 
 SET_FORM_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_FORM,VALIDATION_UNIT,FORM_SCOPE);
 
 IF NAME_IN(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_ITEM) IS NULL THEN
 ldat_initial_date := PCKG_GCNSTS.pdat_initial_date_for_trans;
 ELSE
 ldat_initial_date := NAME_IN(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_ITEM);
 END IF;
 
 DATE_LOV.GET_DATE(ldat_initial_date ,
 :SYSTEM.CURSOR_ITEM,
 260,
 60,
 'Select a Date ',
 'Ok',
 'Cancel',
 true,
 false,
 false);
 SET_FORM_PROPERTY(:SYSTEM.CURSOR_FORM,VALIDATION_UNIT,DEFAULT_SCOPE) ; 
 
 END IF;
 
END IF;

END;

Trigger.Name: ON-CLEAR-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 IF :PARAMETER.PARM_MODE IN (PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_EDIT_MODE,
 PCKG_GCNSTS.GCST_ADD_MODE
 ) THEN
 -- message(11111); 
 -- message(11111); 
 -- pro_pop_detial_part;
 post;
 end if;
 -- message(22222222); 
 -- message(222222222); 
 Clear_All_Master_Details;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--
